body.head: Technical introduction
body.p:
In approaching the technical work for ncse, the CCH sought to address three primary research questions:
How might a semantic 'view' be generated of items within the ncse corpus through a hybrid approach of manual- and algorithmic- assigned keywords?
What kinds of end-user services could be produced using this data to aid the user in finding and retrieving articles relevant to their research?
How could this semantic environment best be integrated with the end-user browsing and searching services provided within the Olive software?

This technical introduction is aimed at the non-specialist to give an overview of the technologies and processes used to create the ncse. Interested readers may also wish to consult our list of Technical Acknowledgements.
